component.name: LinguaEdit
component.summary: Translation file editor for PO, TS, XLIFF, JSON, YAML, and more

description.p: LinguaEdit is a professional translation file editor built with Qt6. It supports PO, TS, XLIFF, JSON, YAML, Android XML, ARB, and PHP localization files with built-in linting, pre-translation via AI and translation memory, and platform integration with Transifex, Weblate, and Crowdin.

ul.li: Edit PO, TS, XLIFF, JSON, YAML, Android XML, ARB, and PHP files
Built-in linting with placeholder and format string validation
Pre-translate with AI (OpenAI, Anthropic) or free services (Lingva, MyMemory)
Light, dark, and system theme support

description.p: Major release with 11 languages, documentation, theme support, and compilation features.
